name: Answers & Questions (Q&A)
description:
This widget allows you to manage Q&A from within Figma and FigJam! Teammates can add questions and vote on ones they want to see answered. Easily add answers and keep track of what's been addressed.


Features

  • Ask questions and write answers to those questions
  • Attribute questions to teammates or ask questions anonymously
  • Upvote questions, with the ability to show or hide voters' photos
  • Separate sections for answered and unanswered questions
  • Edit questions and answers to fix typos
